text: 1.3: Mt 28.17; Mk 16.12; Ru 24.36-49; FG 10.41; 1 Ko 15.5-7Zisas fharav won ŋaara bakɨme mbuav kav, zaa bakɨme ndigap, rimgiap, taagia khavgiap, mbaram vov wo farasegi ŋaara gumgir hɨgi. Ana mben hɨgap, won mbe khɨvav ana bigi vhɨrvera muuŋgi. Ana mba bigir muuŋrim, mbe ana gangip, ana khothɨgɨp khaŋ suanga, “Ana guigira rimgiap taagia khavgi.” Ana mba tɨvar mbe mbuav 40 rarir ana mbe phorga kav Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga bunin mbe suaŋgi.
